title: Unchained Alistar
body:
So i subbed to the LoL youtube channel but I didn't get the Alistar skin, Ali is my go to supp and i would like the skin thnx riot 




{{champion:103}} ily want the {{champion:12}} skin man {{champion:6}}

replies.body:
Doesn't work for OCE. you have to send in a support ticket.

Also you can get a free Garen skin for following them on Twitter and a Free Tristana skin for liking their facebook page
